items.typeLine: Trickster's Corvine Charm of the Elementalist
explicitMods: 23% chance to gain 25% of Non-Chaos Damage with Hits as Extra Chaos Damage
16% increased Effect of Buffs granted by your Golems
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Charm Socket on the Wildwood Primalist Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Forbidden Flesh
explicitMods: Allocates Unstable Infusion if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flame
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The bodies of those wholly subsumed by the Tangle
continue to merge and mutate and cry out for release...

items.name: Chimeric Splinter
enchantMods: 2 Added Passive Skills are Jewel Sockets
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 12% increased Lightning Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +4% to Fire Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Snowstorm
1 Added Passive Skill is Stormrider
1 Added Passive Skill is Widespread Destruction
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Militant Faith
explicitMods:
Carved to glorify 9748 new faithful converted by High Templar Dominus
Passives in radius are Conquered by the Templars
Minions have +60 to Accuracy Rating per 10 Devotion
3% increased Defences from Equipped Shield per 10 Devotion
Historic
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: They believed themselves the utmost faithful, but that conviction became oppression.

items.name: Luminous Sliver
enchantMods: 1 Added Passive Skill is a Jewel Socket
Added Small Passive Skills grant: 10% increased Projectile Damage
explicitMods: Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +2 to Intelligence
Added Small Passive Skills also grant: +3% to Lightning Resistance
1 Added Passive Skill is Aerodynamics
1 Added Passive Skill is Streamlined
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: The Interrogation
explicitMods: Adds Secrets of Suffering
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Small, Medium or Large Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Added passives do not interact with jewel radiuses. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: But if you seek the truth,
Fear of pain unknown has no parallel.

Cannot take Reflected Elemental Damage
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Charm Socket on the Wildwood Primalist Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.

items.name: Watcher's Eye
explicitMods: 4% increased maximum Energy Shield
4% increased maximum Life
6% increased maximum Mana
57% increased Cold Damage while affected by Hatred
+33% to Critical Strike Multiplier while affected by Anger
Unaffected by Vulnerability while affected by Determination
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: One by one, they stood their ground against a creature
they had no hope of understanding, let alone defeating,
and one by one, they became a part of it.

items.name: That Which Was Taken
explicitMods: +13% chance to Suppress Spell Damage
19% chance to gain 25% of Non-Chaos Damage with Hits as Extra Chaos Damage
Cannot take Reflected Elemental Damage
21% increased Effect of Buffs granted by your Golems
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: Faith given under false pretenses still carries the same power.

items.name: Forbidden Flame
explicitMods: Allocates Unstable Infusion if you have the matching modifier on Forbidden Flesh
items.descrText: Place into an allocated Jewel Socket on the Passive Skill Tree. Right click to remove from the Socket.
flavourText: The minds of those studied utterly by the Cleansing Fire
continue to think and dream and beg for silence...

11.name: Snowstorm
stats: Gain 8% of Lightning Damage as Extra Cold Damage against Chilled Enemies

3.name: Stormrider
stats: 10% chance to gain a Power Charge when you Shock a Chilled Enemy
25% increased Cold Damage with Hits against Shocked Enemies
25% increased Lightning Damage with Hits against Chilled Enemies

37.name: Secrets of Suffering
stats:
Cannot Ignite, Chill, Freeze or Shock
Critical Strikes inflict Scorch, Brittle and Sapped
reminderText: (Scorched Enemies have their Elemental Resistances lowered by up to 30%, based on the Fire Damage of the Hit, for 4 seconds)
(Hits have up to +6% Critical Strike Chance against Brittle Enemies, based on the Cold Damage of the Hit which inflicted Brittle, for 4 seconds)
(Sapped Enemies deal up to 20% less Damage, based on the Lightning Damage of the Hit, for 4 seconds)
flavourText: Even within the realm of torture, there are subtle intricacies.
